title: Quotient Rule
text: Apply the quotient rule, that $$\ln\left(\frac{x}{y}\right)=\ln\left(x\right)-\ln\left(y\right)$$ to the left hand side of the equation to simplify.

title: Simplifying Quotient Rule
text: What is the left hand side equal to when simplifying using the quotient rule?

title: One-to-One Property
text: When two logarithms share the same base, their arguments must be equal to each other.

title: Set Arguments Equal
text: Set the arguments of the two logarithms with the same base equal to each other to solve for $$x$$.

title: To isolate $$x$$, move all the terms with $$x$$ to one side of the equation and all the other terms without the variable to the other.
